resources.string:
Hi, my name is Ruben 

I am a computer science student at hogent. 

Currently I am learning the basics of android app development. 

I am using the udacity course. 

I like gaming, coding and watching series. 

At home, I have two orange cats. 

The languages i can code in are: Java, C#, Javascript, HTML, CSS, ... 

I made this app with android studio on a MacBook Air. 

Ruben De Freyne 2019
